org.eclipse.scada.configuration.recipe

Interface Task

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskImpl

    public interface Task
    A representation of the model object 'Task'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Execute
    • Name
    • Definition
    • Order

    See Also:
    RecipePackage.getTask()

    • Method Detail

      • getExecute

         getExecute()
        Returns the value of the 'Execute' containment reference list. The list contents are of type Execute. It is bidirectional and its opposite is 'Task'.

        If the meaning of the 'Execute' containment reference list isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        Returns:
        the value of the 'Execute' containment reference list.
        See Also:
        RecipePackage.getTask_Execute(), Execute.getTask()

        Definition getDefinition()
        Returns the value of the 'Definition' container reference. It is bidirectional and its opposite is 'Task'.
